019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonArray;
022import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
023import com.google.gson.JsonPrimitive;
024import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
026import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
027import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
028import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
029import java.util.Collections;
030import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.APP_NAME;
031import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
032import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_NAME;
033import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_VERSION;
034import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
035import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
036import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
037
038/**
039 * Adapts Kubenetes resources to changes in VM definitions (CRs). 
040 */
041@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
042public class Reconciler extends Component {
043
044    /**
045     * Instantiates a new reconciler.
046     *
047     * @param componentChannel the component channel
048     */
049    public Reconciler(Channel componentChannel) {
050        super(componentChannel);
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Handles the change event.
055     *
056     * @param event the event
057     * @param channel the channel
058     * @throws ApiException the api exception
059     * @throws KubectlException 
060     */
061    @Handler
062    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, WatchChannel channel)
063            throws ApiException {
064        DynamicKubernetesApi vmDefApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi(VM_OP_GROUP,
065            VM_OP_VERSION, event.crd().getName(), channel.client());
066        var defMeta = event.metadata();
067        var vmDef = vmDefApi.get(defMeta.getNamespace(), defMeta.getName())
068            .getObject();
069
070        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals")
071        var disks = GsonPtr.to(vmDef.getRaw())
072            .get(JsonArray.class, "spec", "vm", "disks")
073            .map(JsonArray::asList).orElse(Collections.emptyList());
074        int index = 0;
075        for (var disk : disks) {
076            reconcileDisk(vmDef, index++, (JsonObject) disk, channel);
077        }
078    }
079
080    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals", "PMD.ConfusingTernary" })
081    private void reconcileDisk(DynamicKubernetesObject vmDefinition,
082            int index, JsonObject diskDef, WatchChannel channel)
083            throws ApiException {
084        var pvcObject = new DynamicKubernetesObject();
085        pvcObject.setApiVersion("v1");
086        pvcObject.setKind("PersistentVolumeClaim");
087        var pvcDef = GsonPtr.to(pvcObject.getRaw());
088        var vmDef = GsonPtr.to(vmDefinition.getRaw());
089        var pvcTpl = GsonPtr.to(diskDef).to("volumeClaimTemplate");
090
091        // Copy metadata from template and add missing/additional data.
092        var vmName = vmDef.getAsString("metadata", "name").orElse("default");
093        pvcDef.get(JsonObject.class).add("metadata",
094            pvcTpl.to("metadata").get(JsonObject.class).deepCopy());
095        var defMeta = pvcDef.to("metadata");
096        defMeta.computeIfAbsent("namespace", () -> new JsonPrimitive(
097            vmDef.getAsString("metadata", "namespace").orElse("default")));
098        defMeta.computeIfAbsent("name", () -> new JsonPrimitive(
099            vmName + "-disk-" + index));
100        var pvcLbls = pvcDef.to("metadata", "labels");
101        pvcLbls.set("app.kubernetes.io/name", APP_NAME);
102        pvcLbls.set("app.kubernetes.io/instance", vmName);
103        pvcLbls.set("app.kubernetes.io/component", "disk");
104        pvcLbls.set("app.kubernetes.io/managed-by", VM_OP_NAME);
105
106        // Get API and check if PVC exists
107        DynamicKubernetesApi pvcApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi("", "v1",
108            "persistentvolumeclaims", channel.client());
109        var existing = pvcApi.get(defMeta.getAsString("namespace").get(),
110            defMeta.getAsString("name").get());
111
112        // If PVC does not exist, create. Else patch (apply)
113        if (!existing.isSuccess()) {
114            // PVC does not exist yet, copy spec from template
115            pvcDef.get(JsonObject.class).add("spec",
116                pvcTpl.to("spec").get(JsonObject.class).deepCopy());
117            // Add missing
118            pvcDef.to("spec").computeIfAbsent("accessModes",
119                () -> GsonPtr.to(new JsonArray()).set(0, "ReadWriteOnce")
120                    .get());
121            pvcDef.to("spec").getOrSet("volumeMode", "Block");
122            pvcApi.create(pvcObject);
123        } else {
124            // spec is immutable, so mix in existing spec
125            pvcDef.set("spec", GsonPtr.to(existing.getObject().getRaw())
126                .to("spec").get().deepCopy());
127            PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
128            opts.setForce(false);
129            opts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
130            pvcApi.patch(pvcObject.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
131                pvcObject.getMetadata().getName(),
132                V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_APPLY_YAML,
133                new V1Patch(channel.client().getJSON().serialize(pvcObject)),
134                opts).throwsApiException();
135        }
136    }
137
138}
